name: Danang to hue by private car
description: You are staying in Danang city and you would like to go to Hue city. You are looking forwards transfer service from Danang to Hue. There are much ways of transports from Danang to Hue. You can book the train ticket from Danang to Hue, it’s cheap (about 5 USD) but noisy. Sleeping bus takes the tunnel, which leaves the Hai Van Pass – one of the most scenic roads in Vietnam.
